---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

100 - 15 = 85 ( 0x55 )

index 0 - 000
index 1 - 001
index 2 - 010
index 3 - 011
index 4 - 100
index 5 - 101
index 6 - 110
index 7 - 111

00101 - RS2
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index 0 - XXX
LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index 1 - XXX
LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index 2- XXX
LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index X - XXX
LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index X - XXX
LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index X - XXX
LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index X - XXX
LI R5 with 0000000000001111 at index X - XXX



00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX
LI R1 with 0000000001100100 at index  X - XXX


 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100001111000010010100000   

program


0000000000000000111100101  
0001000000000000111100101  
0010000000000000111100101  
0011000000000000111100101  
0100000000000000111100101  
0101000000000000111100101  
0110000000000000111100101  
0111000000000000111100101  
0000000000000110010000001  
0001000000000110010000001  
0010000000000110010000001  
0011000000000110010000001  
0100000000000110010000001  
0101000000000110010000001  
0110000000000110010000001  
0111000000000110010000001  
1100001111000010010100000   


passes.
